  • pyCBD.tracers.baseTracer module

pyCBD.tracers.baseTracer module¶

class pyCBD.tracers.baseTracer.BaseTracer(uid=- 1, filename=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for all tracers.

Parameters

  • uid – A unique identifier for the tracer. Defaults to -1 (unset).

  • filename (str) – The name of the file to write to. When None, the trace is written to the terminal/console. Defaults to None.

Warning

This class contains virtual methods and should therefore only be subclassed; not instantiated.

setModelName(model_name)[source]¶

Sets a model name for the tracer.

Parameters

model_name (str) – The CBD model name

setInterpolator(interpolator)[source]¶
getInterpolator()[source]¶
openFile(recover=False)[source]¶

Opens the file.

Parameters

recover (bool) – When True, the file needs to be recovered, i.e. it must be appended.

closeFile()[source]¶

Closes the file.

startTracer(recover=False)[source]¶

Starts the tracer. The file should be opened in this function. Additionally, file headers can be written here.

Parameters

recover (bool) – When True, the file needs to be recovered, i.e. it must be appended.

See also

openFile()

stopTracer()[source]¶

Stops the tracer. The file should be closed in this function.

See also

closeFile()

traceStartNewIteration(curIt, time)[source]¶

Traces the start of a new iteration.

Note

This function must be implemented in the subclass(es)!

Parameters

  • curIt (int) – The current iteration.

  • time (numeric) – The current simulation time.

traceEndIteration(curIt, time)[source]¶

Traces the end of a new iteration.

Note

This function must be implemented in the subclass(es)!

Parameters

  • curIt (int) – The current iteration.

  • time (numeric) – The current simulation time.

traceCompute(curIt, block)[source]¶

Traces the computation of a specific block.

Note

This function must be implemented in the subclass(es)!

Parameters

  • curIt (int) – The current iteration.

  • block (CBD.Core.BaseBlock) – The block for which a compute just happened.

traceEndSimulation(stime)[source]¶

Traces the end of a simulation.

Parameters

stime (numeric) – The final simulation time.

trace(*text)[source]¶

Writes text to the trace file or the console. If a trace file was set, the coloring will be removed.

Parameters

*text – The text(s) to write.

traceln(*text)[source]¶

Writes text to the trace file, appended with a newline.

Parameters

*text – The text(s) to write.

timeInfo(format='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')[source]¶

Obtains the current time as a string, which allows detailed trace information.

Parameters

format (str) – The format string.

See also

Documentation on time formatting.
